title: Ticket #2119: Master losing track of startd on FreeBSD
description: I've seen a number of cases in which there are one (or more) startd's running, but the master seems to be unaware of them, and keeps trying to restart the startd. Chaos and madness await thee at this end. I suspect that something in the procapi isn't functioning properly. I'll start by re-running the procapi tests, and go from there.
creator: nleroy
